title: Start
next1
body:
{CoreyMcCormack}
Last year my family took a trip to Coney Island. 
That’s my mum, my step-dad, me and my twin brother Carey.
It was awesome! But the problem is, ever since we got back, Carey has been acting weird.
[[...|next2]]

title: next2
body:
{CoreyMcCormack}
He doesn’t wanna play baseball anymore, he just wants to sit in an armchair and read the sports pages.
He yells at the TV and keeps a stash of beers under his bed!

[[...|next3]]
